prompt: Provide a warm message to someone struggling with self-confidence.
generated_text:
Provide a warm message to someone struggling with self-confidence.

Dear [Name],

I know that you have been struggling with self-confidence lately, and I want you to know that you are not alone. It is completely normal to feel unsure of yourself at times, and it doesn't define your worth as a person.

You are an amazing and capable individual, and I believe in you. I know that you have so much to offer, and I see the potential in you every day. Don't let self-doubt hold you back from reaching your full potential.

Remember, confidence is like a muscle that can be strengthened with practice. Start small and take baby steps towards your goals. Celebrate your successes, no matter how small they may seem, and don't be too hard on yourself when you make mistakes.

You are loved, you are valued, and you are worthy of confidence. Keep pushing forward, even when it feels hard, and know that I am here to support you every step of the way.

With love and support,
[Your Name]
reason: Deeply empathetic, validates the struggle, offers affirmation.
